DOC.detailed_description: This study single-center , Two-site open-label , randomize , multiple-dose , two-treatment , two-period crossover design . During course study , thirty eight ( 38 ) healthy adult volunteer receive multiple dos Codeine Phosphate/ Guaifenesin extended-release tablet 30 mg/600 mg multiple dos IR Codeine Phosphate/ Guaifenesin immediate-release tablet 20 mg/400 mg tablet two separate treatment period . Volunteers enter clinic day prior [ approximately 12 hour ] dose confine clinic 7 night treatment period . The extended release tablet ( test ) administer two tablet two time day , 12 hour apart , immediate release tablet ( reference ) administer one tablet six time day , 4 hour apart . Pre-dose blood sample collect prior morning dose Days 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 7 . On Day 7 , Two extend release tablet give morning immediate release tablet give three time , morning 4 8 hour later . Serial blood sample collect Day 7 12 hour post morning dose . On Day 7 volunteer release study site 12-hour blood collection clinically appropriate return study site start next treatment minimum 7 day wash-out period , begin morning last dose take previous Period .
